name: Reprime prototype
description:
WASD to move
Right mouse button to jump
Hold Right mouse button to climb blocks
Left mouse button to slide
(space and shift also work)

I made this 5 years ago, and felt like fixing the bugs and uploading as a webgl

There's no real objective, just try to have fun hopping around and maybe make it to the top.
Slide of course does nothing worthwhile, but 5 years ago I didn't think to make only the essentials and build out when I found a need for a mechanic.

Unfinished movement game based on refunct's movement system.
If you liked this, buy refunct instead
